headline: The Five Takes Glee in Democrats Not Appearing with Biden: ‘Entirely Ghosting the President’
author: Michael Luciano
sentences:

Cohosts of The Five appeared to relish in the fact some Democrats have been declining to appear at events with President Joe Biden, whose approval ratings are currently underwater.
